alert.note: Alert for Pottawattamie (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 06 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN POTTAWATTAMIE COUNTY THROUGH 1230 AM CDT... At 1159 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 4 miles southeast of Hancock, or 15 miles west of Atlantic, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Oakland, Hancock, and Botna Bend Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
